Passion is the story of a man defying social convention to become a world champion in competitive beard growing. It stars Kevin Spacey, Zachary Braff, and Chris Pratt.

Vampires is a dark and suspenseful film about a family of vampires who are tormented by a gang of "Rockabillies". It stars Gregory Sierra, Thomas Ian Griffith, and Sheryl Lee.
